<Extension syslog> Module xm_syslog </Extension>
<Input in> Module im_tcp Port 1234 Host 0.0.0.0 Exec parse_syslog_bsd(); </Input>
<Output dbi> Module om_dbi SQL INSERT INTO log (facility, severity, hostname, timestamp, application, message) \ VALUES ($SyslogFacility, $SyslogSeverity, $Hostname, '$EventTime', $SourceName, $Message) Driver pgsql Option host 127.0.0.1 Option username dbuser Option password secret Option dbname logdb </Output>
<Route 1> Path in => dbi </Route>
